creator.description:
Helps people with this sexual orientation self-describe and find each other. #Zoosexuality #Zoophilia #Zoopride

Please stay away from labellers run by antis / bigots, as you give them hidden moderation privileges over your feed.

locales.description: Account of a person who identifies as a zoo. This label is sourced from an anti blocklist. It is a transitional label while we move onto the ones below.
locales.name: Open Zoo

locales.description: This person identifies as zoosexual and pescatarian.
locales.name: Pescatarian Zoo

locales.description: This person identifies as zoosexual and vegetarian.
locales.name: Vegetarian Zoo

locales.description: This person identifies as zoosexual and vegan.
locales.name: Vegan Zoo

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON) This person creates zoo-oriented art and content (any medium: graphic, written, audiovisual, etc...)
locales.name: Zoo Artist / Creator

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON) This person participates in efforts to destigmatize zoosexuality and help it become a more widely accepted sexual orientation.
locales.name: Zoo Activist

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON) This person identifies as zoosexual.
locales.name: Zoosexual

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON) This person does not identify as zoosexual but supports and accepts people who do.
locales.name: Zoo Ally

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON) This person identifies as a zoosexual who is exclusively attracted to non-human animals.
locales.name: Zoo Exclusive

locales.description: (SELF-LABELLING COMING SOON)This person identifies someone who is on the fence about their zoosexuality or just started exploring this side of their sexuality.
locales.name: Zoocurious
